issue.title: [Go] AppendBooleans in BitmapWriter is broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14001](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14001). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The logic in the AppendBooleans for bitmap writers in the Go implementation is broken, I discovered as such when performing some upgrades to the Go parquet implementation locally.
